مرکری چاہتے تھے کہ لوگ 'بوہیمین ریپسوڈی': Did Freddie Mercury want people to find their own meaning in 'Bohemian Rhapsody'? Freddie Mercury Bohemian Rhapsody meaning

“It is one of those songs which has such a fantasy feel about it,” Mercury said. “I think people should just listen to it, think about it, and then make up their own minds as to what it says to them.”
Did Freddie Mercury want people to find their own meaning in 'Bohemian Rhapsody'? Freddie Mercury Bohemian Rhapsody meaning

Here is the crux of the song. Freddie here is referring to realising that he is bisexual (not gay). He has just murdered his old self, the person his parents knew and who has certain expectations placed upon him. Freddie knows he's going to disappoint his mother and as such the reference to having thrown it all away.
